data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,173,200 people living in Changzhou, Jiangsu, China. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Changzhou, Jiangsu, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Changzhou, Jiangsu, China.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 89,000 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Changzhou. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Licheng
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Licheng, Jiangsu, China.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Changzhou, Jiangsu, China to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Changzhou, Jiangsu, China.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Changzhou prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.
